thread.title: Gravitas Ventures unleashes THE INHABITANTS this October
thread.title_full: Gravitas Ventures unleashes THE INHABITANTS this October

author: prbuzz.com
title: Gravitas Ventures unleashes THE INHABITANTS this October
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
SPEND THE NIGHT WITH THE INHABITANTS !
Salem, MA â€“ Gravitas Ventures, an independent film distributor, is releasing the supernatural thriller THE INHABITANTS in North American on October 13th, 2015 just in time for Halloween. The film will air on multiple VOD platforms including iTunes, Amazon Video, Vudu, Google Play, Xbox LIVE, Sony Playstation, various cable providers, and more.
Written and directed by Michael and Shawn Rasmussen, screenwriters of JOHN CARPENTER'S THE WARD and produced by international bestselling author Glenn Cooper, this spooky ghost story revolves around a young couple that gets more than they bargained for when they renovate a neglected bed and breakfast in New England. After a series of disturbing events, the husband begins to suspect that something evil is lurking within the walls of this old house, and whatever it is has set its sights on his wife.
THE INHABITANTS was filmed on location inside one of New England's oldest haunted houses. The Noyes-Parris House (c. 1669) was owned by the Rev. Samuel Parris who was the father of Betty Parris and uncle to Abigail Williams, the two girls who made the initial accusations that started the infamous Salem Witch Trials.
For more information visit this link http://bit.ly/InhabiTunes
